chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: This chapter covers the installation of &PRODUCT; on various operating systems, including GNU/Linux, and Microsoft Windows.

important.title: Important
important.para: To run &PRODUCT; on your system, a working installation of Perl is required, version 5.8.8 or higher.

section.title: Installing from the Source Code
section.para: To install &PRODUCT; from the source code, download the latest source package from the official homepage, and unpack it:
A directory called blazeblogger-&VERSION; will appear in the current working directory. Get into it, and type make install at a shell prompt:

This will install executables, manual pages, documentation, and application data to the /usr/local/ directory, and place Bash completion file to /etc/bash_completion.d/.
